website_summaries.verdict: Your best bet if you're going to be spending a lot of time outside and don't want to apply an oily sunscreen.
pros: Available in 3 shades to match all skin tones
Fine powder that doesn't sit in pores
Suitable for your face as well
cons: May not be the best choice for sensitive skin, as it has caused breakouts in some people

customer_reviews.title: I have terrible melasma so if I don't use a sunscreen with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible melasma so if I don't use a sunscreen with a physical block the skin above my upper lip turns black and looks like a lovely mustache. Needless to say, I layer on sunscreen. I like this one because I can dab it over my make up when I need to reapply, while that's not an option with creams. It's great for sweaty beach days because it absorbs moisture unlike creams that run off.This stuff definitely works. It's a little white but I wear it almost everyday, you can't really tell if you use it sparingly over make up.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Cornwall

customer_reviews.title: messy
customer_reviews.text: I chose not to use the included applicator for sanitary reasons. I wash my brushes every weekend and I wanted to have something that was larger and had bristles. That being said, opening the container is extremely messy and allows product to be spilled and therefore wasted. Product does not irritate skin, which is good. Cannot say how much sun damage it is protecting me against, but I know it does not do anything funky to a full face of makeup.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Love this!  Will not go back to gooey sunscreen EVER
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I put it in the Jane Iredale travel brush, and it is totally mess free. Plus that makes a very even coverage for my face. I also use it like a powder sometimes. Does not clog pores. Easy to use. Looks great. Comes off easily with Jane Iredale magic mitt. Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: WC8

customer_reviews.title: Not Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok- I am lazy and just do not write reviews. But for this product, I actually logged in to rave. I originally purchased the translucent powder but found that many other reviewers were correct.. it is not really translucent but is better suited for those with a light complexion. It was not a match for my olive skin - but I exchanged the translucent powder with no issues or hassles from Amazon and purchased the Golden powder instead. Now this powder is perfect. It looks great on my skin and I love knowing that I have an additional protective barrier to help prevent sun damage. 100% will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use even on toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Super to easy to use and protected my light pink skin even in the Caribbean sun. Translucent did make my skin appear more pale as I usually wear the Iredale Natural color during Spring. I have rosacea and psoriasis and it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. I even use it on my toddler who will not stay still for conventional sunscreen but loves this and I can even apply it to her scalp without issues.
customer_reviews.author: EMT2RN

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: The applicator is odd at first, but once I got used to it and kept it in the box for storage, I fell in love! The Supergoop/DermaE/MineralFusion/etc. SPF powders pale in comparison. It might be a tad more expensive, but it's actually weirdly more affordable per oz than a lot of the others; it comes with a lot of product. Oh, and it's clean beauty too! So amazing. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Bad applicator, good powder
customer_reviews.text: The sponge that this comes with sucks. It'd have been way better off as a brush because the sponge clumps it on. So despite it being translucent it ends up looking like very pale foundation with the sponge. I had to get a separate makeup brush to use this with, but the powder itself works well. Personally, I think Tarte has the best applicator/powder suncreen stick but I wanted to try something I could get from Prime for efficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Sahara T.

customer_reviews.title: Not Translucent at All!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not at all what I was expecting. As other reviewers have mentioned, the design makes it messy to deal with; powder simply gets everywhere. Most importantly, though, the translucent isn't translucent at all, but white. This wouldn't be so bad if after a while it would set into the skin, but it doesn't. It is thick, white powder that sits on top of the skin. I do not recommend if you are looking for something translucent!
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaB

customer_reviews.title: It's the only dry powder sunscreen I've every seen.  I use it over my foundation
customer_reviews.text: I like the sunscreen powder. Bought two golden and one nude. The only thing I don't like is trying to get the firm out of the bottle initially. I spilled a lot of the powder. Otherwise I would give it a 5 star. I love Jane Iredale makeup. Always with high quality. It's a bit pricey, but I don't mind paying for quality.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Applicator design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the applicator. As I was apply it today the sponge fell off applicator n spilled powder on my shirt and the floor. About half of the product was lost. Very expensive to lose half to the floor n my shirt. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kina

customer_reviews.title: Great natural look that's good for your skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product as I like most Jane Iredale products. It looks natural but gives a nice sheer coverage while protecting my skin from UVA. I use translucent for natural coverage. Most days, I first use Jane Iredale's moisture tint, Dream Tint, in "peach brightener." Dream Tint comes in various soft shades. I apply the Powder Me Dry Sunscreen with a brush. I shake some of the powder onto the sponge applicator and load my brush off the sponge. A jar will last me a year.
customer_reviews.author: MustangMary

customer_reviews.title: For very very fair skin only, it's not actually translucent
customer_reviews.text: I should have taken the reviews to heart. This is not a clear or what I would think of as translucent powder, as described. I have pretty fair skin but this powder is more like actual make up for someone with very very fair skin. I just wanted a powder sunscreen that would blend in to my natural tone. If that's what you're looking for I found the Eminence sunscreen powder in translucent does exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Laura T.

customer_reviews.title: Clogged my pores
customer_reviews.text: Blocked the sun and made my face breakout in black heads. Sticking with coconut oil. I also didn't like the way when applying large amounts would sprinkle to the floor. Messy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I actually haven’t tested it in the sun, but I love the way this provides me with a nice matte finish but is not heavy. Great soft applicator and no scent.
customer_reviews.author: HuskerinIowa

customer_reviews.title: Coverage, without break outs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect summer sun protection. Complete coverage! This product doesn't clump or run. I even wear it in the ocean and pool. It is the ONLY face powder I can wear that DOESN'T make my face break out.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa May Serrano

customer_reviews.title: No breakouts
customer_reviews.text: This is the only powder sunscreen i’ve found that doesn’t break me out.The way i fixed the color problem was to buy both colors of the sunscreen and mix them together ,the color is perfect.As for the aplicator you can actually remove the cloth covering and sponge to wash them.
customer_reviews.author: anisa

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: It is tiny!!!! for that price I would have expected to have great sun protection plus coverage. anything barely comes out, is not worth the money . I could have gotten a way cheaper one at the drug store. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to get a powder sunblock, but this really worked. Apply over the make up and there you go! It didn't overly dry my make up. It felt just like powdering up during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Tassae

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sunscreen; My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen has the ingredients that my dermatologist recommends. This sunscreen blocks the sun so you only need to put it on about 10 minutes before you go out. It is easy to put on and the color is just right for me. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria, VA

customer_reviews.title: Baby Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I found this sunscreen in a store in New Orleans (but I live in Florida) and it was perfect to use on my two month old daughter (most sunscreens are not to be put on babies prior to six months). I loved it so much she is still using it at 14 months. We are avid boaters and my daughter is a very fair red head which could spell disaster. This stuff is a lifesaver, no sunburns so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!  No stinging eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen! I have used it for over 8 years!! I am in the sun a lot especially with tennis and water activities. Nothing stays on as well as this and nothing protects my skin as well either. My favorite thing about it is that it doesn’t sting your eyes like all other sunscreens. This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protector!!
customer_reviews.text: I love to wear this at the beach. Excellent sun protection and I love the color it gives to my face. Very easy to apply plus it has a small mirror on the cap to apply evenly. Great option!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica A.

customer_reviews.title: really good product! Great for SPF needs, and it stays on for a long time!
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly, and I love the way it goes on and STAYS on...I don't like the container, my big brush doesn't fit well in it and I don't use the attached pad, but I do like the powder. and the fact that it offers SPF. that is SO nice
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Can't live without this sunscreen. I use it for myself and my two little girls. It's especially helpful for putting in my girls' hair, like around their part. Love this stuff and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very good in humid climates, not in dry climates.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent sunscreen to use in humid climates where sun lotions and creams can be very sticky and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Fan

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen better than traditional kind
customer_reviews.text: Best sunscreen. Way better than creams. Started using when my kids went thru their pimple stage and we continue to only use this. No grease and actually protects against the sun
customer_reviews.author: Romy Marra

customer_reviews.title: too white
customer_reviews.text: maybe because I applied this over sunscreen when I was testing it out, but it was very white, not just clear.
customer_reviews.author: giantdogs

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t look good
customer_reviews.text: It’s cakey and very white. Sucks that it costed so much, I’ll never use it.
customer_reviews.author: YUmi

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to reapply!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the coverage it provides as well as the sun protection. I will be using this for many years!
customer_reviews.author: Amber J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Putting sunscreen on children is so difficult; especially when they think it's going to burn their eyes or something. This powder is easy as can be (and it can elicit giggles) and the coverage is great. You can see water "bead" on skin when swimming so this has some protection in water as well as sun. Non-drying and invisible.
customer_reviews.author: ShaniAZ

customer_reviews.title: I like this product a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. Only think that I wish they would add is a lock mechanism for the powder. I can't take this out of the house because I wouldn't be able to keep it upright in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Lara

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful it’s Jane Iredale
customer_reviews.text: Love Jane Iredale products, mixed this with the light one for a little darker when I use spray tanning products. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: have a Backup or alternate sunscreen under powder
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the concept South FL rays require a secondary component
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Easy SPF!  Throw in Handbag!  Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Easy to use! Convenient! 55 year old Texan!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Nealon

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Jane Iredale SPF Powder for several years. I use it daily. After having skin cancer I am very careful take care of my skin. I feel that this adds an extra layer of protection and is light, odorless and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Monkee

customer_reviews.title: always lightweight, no greasy, oily mess
customer_reviews.text: Easy to reapply, no greasy mess. You can add a layer under and over make up and still light coverage weight. Doubles as a setting powder. No waste.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this as a sunscreen and keep a jar in my car to apply before I get on the road. I went through the whole summer with no burning or sun damage. It takes a little effort to get the puff working, but I found once I got it started, it stayed on.
customer_reviews.author: Dbmsewer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my husband because he works outside ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he works outside in Florida and needs something that will block the sin without running down his face with sweat. This product really works. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my young son so I don't have to goop him up if we aren't going to be in the sun all that long. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L Hunsaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Nice! Just for my face neck. Touch up lightly. Glow thanks
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the translucent color is too light for my skin...not translucent at all if your skin is not fair...
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Protect that beautiful face
customer_reviews.text: I don't use any other sunscreen on my face. It works great and has real staying power. I don't know how a powder could be water resistant, but it is!
customer_reviews.author: PJF

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage but....
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage, just wish the had darker products for women of color. The tan is not dark enough if you have a dark complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Tashina Benymon

customer_reviews.title: Great product but reapply after swimming (is good protection in ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has very fair skin with lots of blonde hair and her scalp will sunburn through her hair. There are times when she can't wear a hat to protect her head so she "poofs" this on her head and face and hasn't had a sunburnt scalp since we started using it. The applicator is so simple that she has been applying it herself since she was 7 years old. Great product but reapply after swimming (is good protection in the pool about 1 hour) and make sure to just pull the top up and off; don't twist or the lid will come off an the powder will get everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: sds

customer_reviews.title: Love all the Jane Iredale products and this is no ...
customer_reviews.text: Love all the Jane Iredale products and this is no exception. The concept itself makes me happy. I can apply this powder on top of my makeup and retouch my makeup for added sun protection every 80 mins. This powder just absorbs all the excess oil and makes skin matte which is what I'm looking for. Using it multiple times a day everyday makes the skin dry and may cause irritation(I experienced it couple of times). I also have problem with the sponge applicator. I use my Real Techniques Flat Kabuki brush to apply this product.
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: The coverage/protection is great though.
customer_reviews.text: Even with my light hair it does still show. The coverage/protection is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Powder sunscreen is great for Florida
customer_reviews.text: I really like the concept of powder sunscreen, I live in Florida and am menopausal. The only thing I am somewhat disappointed in this particular product is the light color and the difficulty trying to apply it to shoulders or arms. Good deal though and I am mostly digging it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A. Dameron

customer_reviews.title: Love It.
customer_reviews.text: I love it . I apply it when I arrive to my destination.I notice my foundation stays better on. Im always getting complimants how fresh my face looks.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena W.

customer_reviews.title: On the go
customer_reviews.text: Awesome on the go SPF! Gives skin a matt look and protects well. Great to keep in the car as well for the extra needed protection.
customer_reviews.author: Marinda Engelbrecht

customer_reviews.title: sad
customer_reviews.text: I love her products but I hate this applicator! Its a heavy/thick puff top that have the powder feed through it... it goes on to heavy and wipes off your other makeup -- can look cakey if you arent careful.. I wouldnt buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: works!
customer_reviews.text: I had a different brand with a brush applicator. (Bare Minerals)...which I loved and it worked great. Went to purchase another, and the reviews were terrible. So for the money, I decided to go with this. I hated the applicator...it's a sponge..it made my face look very powdery...soooo, I simply poured this stuff into the bare minerals applicator and it works great! I keep the sponge tip one as a back up in my purse....I have not burned when wearing it (and reapplying...not all that often)...I will buy it again as long as my brush applicator holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Use as the last step of Jane Iredale makeup routine - use as top powder on face to "set" everything.
customer_reviews.author: AugustaMagnolia

customer_reviews.title: great sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. The fact that it is a powder works for me as I do not like the oily feel of other sunscreens. Alot of the time I just use it as my coverage instead of makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Branson

customer_reviews.title: Love this powder
customer_reviews.text: Love this powder, only wish it came with a better applicator. If you press too hard the top pops off and makes a big mess. I still highly recommend it, just be careful when you apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole L Chaput

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Jane Iredale cosmetics are fantastic and this one is my favorite. This is sunscreen but in a powder not a cream so you don't have to slather a cheap cream full of synthetics on your body just to be protected from the sun. No sticky residue. Really superior protection. My first jar was used by my husband, my son, and myself for a full season and there was half a jar left in the Fall. It doesn't expire either so we used the same jar the entire next season.
customer_reviews.author: Louise L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The container with the foam top leaves something to be desired because it doesn't distribute enough product for very sunny conditions. I take the lid off and use a brush to dab it off the bottom of the applicator top. I recommend using some method of setting the powder, dab or spray moisture to set. You will see the change from chalky to neutral.
customer_reviews.author: sg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A super product for those of us who have allergies to all the other sunscreens! I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yet

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: I got the golden, hoping it would be similar to beige/sand, simply a medium tone. Well, it is awfully orange-ish and dark. I tried to wear it twice, but every time I took it off in a couple of minutes, because I looked like from a wax museum. Also the applicator does not work for me, it does not dispense the powder in the nice way I saw it in videos. I have to open it and apply with a brush. Today I accidentally breathed into the opened powder and made a terrible mess from the powder flying around everywhere.This was the last time I gave a it chance. I wish I could return it. I really really hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Classy_Girl

customer_reviews.title: The applicator isn't very helpful, and if I apply ...
customer_reviews.text: The applicator isn't very helpful, and if I apply the powder with a kabuki brush it gets everywhere and irritates my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: NeedsAGoodNightSleep

customer_reviews.title: Best Price
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that Amazon had it for the best price. It was at least $10 more on Jane Iredale website and my wife was worried at first that the makeup was expired since if sold for so much cheaper. The makeup wasn't expired and my wife was very happy when she got the product.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe

customer_reviews.title: Good service and product as described
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a box, as new, looks, smells and feels authentic. Thank you Pro Concepts will consider using you again for future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: JPK

customer_reviews.title: but I do like the results
customer_reviews.text: It's a little messy, but I do like the results.
customer_reviews.author: jlsbsz

customer_reviews.title: Good for Acne Prone Skin
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for my super sensitive, acne prone skin. I can't wear liquid sunscreen because it gives me deep, painful acne. This sunscreen provides enough coverage even out here in the high desert, and doesn't irritate my skin. The jar has lasted 8 months now, and I still have plenty left!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: Great powder and it works since it is the opposite ...
customer_reviews.text: Great powder and it works since it is the opposite of the liquid ones it doesn't make you feel oily. I would recommend it but be careful with the application.
customer_reviews.author: Joy V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect non-greasy SPF for the face
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It applies easily, works great, and does not clog my pores. It is compact and comes with a small mirror on the top of the cap; making it perfect for the purse or gym bag. My children like it as well because it does not burn their eyes when they sweat or get wet.
customer_reviews.author: P. Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Best for bare skin...
customer_reviews.text: The powder was great but the application was awful. The sponge seemed very ineffective for how i wanted to use it-- over my foundation (by Jane } that contains no spf. Some things improve with time... I have used her products for a long time and usually more than not luv her products.
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: the applicator is useless
customer_reviews.text: CON: I gave up on the applicator after a couple of attempts and just use a brush from another product. The tan color looks orange on me, which is probably just my coloring --only 2 color options and I don't know that translucent would have been any better for summer usage. PRO: Product does block sun and does not irritate my skin. I was looking for something stronger than the SPF 15 in my foundation powder and this product is working for that, it would be fine for folks who match the shade if they fixed their applicator.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I am not a fan of the pasty white face creams that are difficult to blend. This is an easy application, not messy and evens your skin tone. I used it in the AM on my face & neck while scuba diving & 30 min lap swims in th ocean. If I were to be out in the sun for any amount of time after my recreation, I would apply again.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very Thick
customer_reviews.text: Effective, but very thick and the shade options are limited and don't suit my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: chogge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So nice for mid day touch up. Doesn't mess with previously applied makeup application.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Palmer

customer_reviews.title: powder sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful alternative to lotion sunscreen. I ordered the translucent. It's the only makeup I wear and while I look a tad pale it's not to bad with my light olive skin tone. All in all I like it. It has a nice finish and doesn't collect in my wrinkles!
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the powder gives my face a finished look!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter first tried this product out at a spa and it gave her face glow like she spent hours on her makeup. This was her first request for a Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: KJW

customer_reviews.title: Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can tap the sunscreen on my face over my makeup. I am outside all day and this definitly stays Put all day.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it too.
customer_reviews.text: I've recently just started using Jane Iredale products. I love that this is so easy to apply & I can even use it on my kids.. Just throw it in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Belich

product_meta.title: jane iredale Powder-Me SPF Dry Sunscreen, 0.62 oz
product_meta.description:
Color:TranslucentA dry sunscreen for face and body without chemical sunscreen actives. SPF 30 broad spectrum (UVA/UVB) sun protection. Water resistant to 40 minutes. Can be used on sunburn to help calm and soothe the skin. Reef safe sunscreen.

BRAND STORY
jane iredale is a comprehensive line of mineral makeup developed to enhance the lives of women by delivering personal, natural beauty to lift her health and spirit.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
